about_the_game:
Knightica is a turn-based roguelike auto-battler where you lead an army of powerful units. Recruit, place and command your troops to free the Kingdoms. Discover amazing synergies, gather demonic souls, face dangerous monsters and lead your army to victory!

DEMO CONTENT

  • 20 Unique Playable Units – Choose from a diverse roster of powerful units to lead your army.

  • 2 Worlds – Battle through the first two worlds, each with their own unique bosses.

  • 10+ Different Enemy Units – Face a variety of challenging enemy types that keep each encounter fresh.

  • Random Start Bonuses – Unlock a range of bonuses after completing your first game for even more strategic possibilities.

  • 8 Events – Encounter random events that will change the course of your battle.

  • 35 Powerful Spells – Master a wide array of spells to turn the tide of battle in your favor.

  • 3 Playable Commanders – Choose from three unique commanders, each with their own abilities and playstyles.

  • 39 Demon Souls – Collect powerful elite enemy rewards that offer strategic advantages to strengthen your army.
